``` Landmarks should be unique because they serve as navigation landmarks for assistive technology users. If multiple landmarks have the same role and are not uniquely identified, it can be confusing and difficult for users to navigate the page. Additionally, some assistive technologies may not be able to distinguish between landmarks with the same role, which can lead to incorrect navigation.
